description:
Looking for a quick way to figure out the tempo of a song or need to create a cheat sheet for your DJ set tonight?

BPM Counter Pro is a simple to use music bpm (beats per minute) counter plus metronome, glow stick & circle of fifths reference for webOS. 

BPM Counter Pro also allows you to save a tempo along with a song title and notes for future reference, perfect for the DJ or musician on the go.

Includes metronome, tempo markings, user selectable song keys with auto generated harmonic mixing keys and built in glowstick.

How to Use: You can access your list of saved tempos through the app menu when you swipe on the top left of the screen.On the pixi, the save button is accessible by scrolling down. Please note the metronome uses system sounds due to software limitations and may not always maintain accuracy.

 For any questions please contact support@chinchillatech.com
